mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_id, g.goods_number, g.goods_name, g.goods_brand, g.s_type_id, g.goods_pic, g.goods_edition, g.business_id, g.goods_comment, g.goods_price, g.create_time, b.business_name, b.is_flagship, gs.s_type_name, gb.type_name FROM goods_info AS g LEFT JOIN business_info AS b ON g.business_id = b.business_id LEFT JOIN goods_small_category AS gs ON g.s_type_id = gs.s_type_id LEFT JOIN goods_big_category AS gb ON gs.b_type_id = gb.type_id
SELECT gb.type_id, gb.type_name, gs.s_type_id, gs.s_type_name FROM `goods_big_category` AS gb LEFT JOIN goods_small_category AS gs ON gb.type_id = gs.b_type_id
